mapper.select: SELECT CAT_CODE, CAT_TYPE, CAT_NAME, PCAT_CODE FROM CATEGORY_T
SELECT CAT_CODE, CAT_TYPE, CAT_NAME, PCAT_CODE FROM CATEGORY_T WHERE CAT_TYPE = 'M'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CATEGORY_T WHERE CAT_TYPE = 'M'

SELECT FACILITY_ID, MODEL_NAME, BUY_DT, FACILITY_STATE, RENT_TERM, CAT_NAME, CAT_CODE, PCAT_CODE, CAT_TYPE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C.CAT_NAME ASC, F.BUY_DT DESC) AS RN , C.CAT_CODE, C.PCAT_CODE, C.CAT_TYPE, C.CAT_NAME , F.FACILITY_ID, F.MODEL_NAME, F.BUY_DT, F.FACILITY_STATE, F.RENT_TERM FROM CATEGORY_T C INNER JOIN FACILITY_MANAGE_T F ON C.CAT_CODE = F.CAT_CODE) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT CAT_NAME, RENT_TERM, MODEL_NAME, RENT_ID, START_DT, END_DT, RENT_STATE, FACILITY_ID, RENT_USER FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CAT_NAME, RENT_TERM, MODEL_NAME, RENT_ID, START_DT, END_DT, RENT_STATE, FACILITY_ID, RENT_USER FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C.CAT_NAME ASC) AS RN, R.RENT_ID, R.START_DT, R.END_DT, R.RENT_STATE, F.FACILITY_ID, R.RENT_USER, F.MODEL_NAME, F.RENT_TERM, C.CAT_NAME FROM CATEGORY_T C INNER JOIN FACILITY_MANAGE_T F ON C.CAT_CODE = F.CAT_CODE LEFT JOIN FACILITY_RESERVE_T R ON F.FACILITY_ID = R.FACILITY_ID LEFT JOIN USER_T U ON R.RENT_USER = U.EMP_ID WHERE F.FACILITY_STATE = 0 AND (R.START_DT IS NULL OR R.END_DT IS NULL) ) T WHERE T.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end} ) T2

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RENT_ID, START_DT, END_DT, RENT_STATE, FACILITY_ID, RENT_USER, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY END_DT ASC) AS RN FROM FACILITY_RESERVE_T WHERE END_DT IS NOT NULL ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT F.FACILITY_ID, F.MODEL_NAME, F.BUY_DT, F.FACILITY_STATE, F.RENT_TERM, C.CAT_NAME, C.PCAT_CODE, C.CAT_NAME, C.CAT_TYPE FROM FACILITY_MANAGE_T F INNER JOIN CATEGORY_T C ON F.CAT_CODE = C.CAT_CODE WHERE FACILITY_ID = #{facilityId}
